name: EnableStuntBonusForAll
description: Enables or disables stunt bonuses for all players. If enabled, players will receive monetary rewards when performing a stunt in a vehicle (e.g. a wheelie).

params_body.name: enable
params_body.description: 1 to enable stunt bonuses or 0 to disable them.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn: EnableStuntBonusForPlayer: Toggle stunt bonuses for a player.
